title: Amexio carousel
description: The CarouselView displays a collection of images or other content in a horizontal layout with built-in navigation between the items.

gridData.name: Tab
gridData.description: Moves focus to the next focusable element.All focusable elements in the carousel are included in the page Tab sequence.

gridData.name: Shift+Tab
gridData.description: Moves focus to the previous focusable element.All focusable elements in the carousel are included in the page Tab sequence.

gridData.name: Right Arrow
gridData.description: When focus is on an current carousel image, moves focus to the next carousel image.

gridData.name: Left Arrow
gridData.description: When focus is on an current carousel image, moves focus to the previous carousel image.

gridData.name: header
gridData.description: Header property is work as Title To carousel.

gridData.name: data
gridData.description: Data Containing Image Path, Information and Video URL Refer the DataSource Tab
